entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
